title: Please, absolutely no jokes with Fiddlesticks. Pure horror.
body: Honestly minimal dialogue. Heavy breathing. Screeching. I want to shit when I see or hear him

replies.body:
Your request has been noted. Please wait in the nearest remote cornfield for further instruction. 

Go alone. 

No matter what you hear, don't look behind you.

I was wondering, how much do you guys value input on Fiddlesticks' VGU at this point into the whole project?

Asking for a Friend who's a complete Fiddle nut.

I would love Fiddlesticks to be Urgot level update, voice wise. A serious, scary, dark voice that even his jokes and taunts are "this guy kills, literally."

Fiddlesticks should be offspring of horror and terror, twin brother of Nocturne. 

Make him have nice interactions though please. You have no idea how much we lore fans love interactions. We always get disappointed when there is too few of them. He was always disconnected to the Runeterra. With interactions to targonians, shurimans, freljordians (which I expect he will be related to at least one of them), we can jizz on our pants.

Uhmm.. Let's say a fan makes a fan vgu suggestion post*uhmm*on the boards. would you actually take it into consideration?
I'd be down for that but also I wouldn't mind some jokes.

Jokes don't need to be funny.
I'd like something twisted, like his "I got no brain" line.
Yeah, he can have darker jokes rather than a typical funny thing.

There's no harm in him playing with his food. Also Surprise Party Fiddlesticks exists, so I expect him to have some sort of joke to go with that skin.

Although..I do wonder who will provide him with a Voice? Will his original VO reprise his role or will we get a new actor (or none at all?)

I honestly want him to have something he says that EVERYONE on the map hears, maybe some malicious cackling or something, I don't know when he'd say it since I don't know his kit but this would really fit the horrific jump scare idea

Horror along the lines of urgot is fine, but id prefer not going full horror. Its really not too fitting for the game or all that fun to deal with. Urgot's ult fits horror themes enough thematically without going overboard.
The only horror here is that they are going to betray fiddle support mains because he was "originally" a jungler, lul. That desperate for a new jungler?
my friend is sad for the VGU bc he has union jack fiddle, but now it might actually look _decent_
Yes, let's give ~~Scarecrow~~ Fiddlesticks the treatment he deserves!
